content: painted daisies wrap by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net this pattern is written using uk crochet terms with us terms written along side in brackets materials for this wrap i used 1 yarn cake of scheepjes lemon cassis cream equipment 3 5mm hook needle scissors abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet in uk terms single_crochet in us terms half_double_crochet half treble_crochet in uk terms half_double_crochet in us terms treble_crochet treble_crochet in uk terms double_crochet in us terms st stitch sts stitches pattern to start chain 97 plus 2 extra as your turning chain or first stitch on the next row 1 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook half_double_crochet half_double_crochet across the row turn 2 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in every st across the last stitch is a bit tricky to see make sure you have 98 stitches in total turn 3 chain 3 this is your first stitch treble_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 10 sts *chain 3 miss 1 st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 14 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 3 miss 1 st treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 11 sts turn 4 chain 3 this is your first stitch treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 7 sts *chain 4 miss the next 3 sts double_crochet single_crochet into the 2nd chain of the chain 3 below chain 4 miss the first 3 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 8 sts * repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 4 miss the next 3 sts double_crochet single_crochet into the 2nd chain of the chain 3 below chain 4 miss the next 3 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 8 sts turn 5 chain 3 this is your first stitch treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 5 sts *chain 4 miss the next 2 sts double_crochet single_crochet into the 4th chain of the chain 4 below double_crochet single_crochet in the next st double_crochet single_crochet in the 1st chain of the chain 4 below chain 4 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 4 miss the next 2 sts double_crochet single_crochet into the 4th chain of the chain 4 below double_crochet single_crochet in the next st double_crochet single_crochet in the 1st chain of the chain 4 below
